alert.note: Alert for East Valley; Northwest Pinal County; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 08 at 5:40PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 615 PM MST... At 540 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over San Tan Village Mall, or near Gilbert, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mesa, Chandler, Gilbert, Tempe, East Mesa, Sun Lakes, Queen Creek, Mesa Riverview Mall, Tempe Marketplace, Chandler Heights, Gilbert City Hall, Downtown Mesa, Tumbleweed Park, Chandler City Hall, Superstition Springs Mall, San Tan Village Mall, Seville, Freestone Park, Fiesta Mall and Chandler Fashion Center Mall. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 165 and 171. US Highway 60 between mile markers 175 and 189. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 157 and 176. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Valley; Northwest Pinal County; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek
